directReach.title: Direct Reach

trueCommunity.title: True Community
trueCommunity.description: A like is cheap. An email is a commitment. Build a base of supporters who actually show up to your shows and buy your merch.

engagement.title: The Math of Engagement
engagement.description: Your email list is your most valuable asset as an artist. We help you build it without you even trying.

features.subtitle: We've built everything you need to scale your community while you stay creative.

zeroEffort.title: Zero Effort Setup
